Copilot provides many different instances to interact with, including:

- VS Code
- Copilot CLI
- Copilot SDK
- GitHub Cloud Agents
- Copilot Language Server

You may use the information below to gather information about GitHub copilot and its integrations. Ensure that you infer the code base for existing integration before continuing.

> The below will help you quickly gather information without too much bloated token information, but you are still free to use web search tools for additional research

## GitHub Copilot CLI

You can use the GitHub MCP to research the https://github.com/github/copilot-cli repository for information

## GitHub Copilot SDK

You can use the GitHub MCP to research the https://github.com/github/copilot-sdk repository for information

## GitHub Copilot Language Server

You can use the GitHub MCP to research the https://github.com/github/copilot-language-server-release repository for information

## VS Code Copilot Chat

You can use the GitHub MCP to research the https://github.com/microsoft/vscode-copilot-chat repository for information
